game

Interface MinHeap<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - - type of elements in the implementing class.

    public interface MinHeap<T>
    An implementation implements a dynamically sized min Heap of elements of type T. Below, N is used as the number of elements currently in the heap.
    Author:
    MPatashnik

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(T t, double priority)
      Add t with priority p to the Heap.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Return true iff the Heap is empty.
      T poll()
      Remove and return the minimum-valued element from the Heap, in worst-case time no more than O(log N).
      int size()
      Return the size of the Heap.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Return a string that represents this heap, in the format: [item1:priority1, item2:priority2, ..., itemN:priorityN] Use the toString() function of the items.
      void updatePriority(T t, double p)
      Change the priority of t to p.

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        java.lang.String toString()
        Return a string that represents this heap, in the format: [item1:priority1, item2:priority2, ..., itemN:priorityN] Use the toString() function of the items.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • poll

        T poll()
        Remove and return the minimum-valued element from the Heap, in worst-case time no more than O(log N). Precondition: the heap is not empty.

      • updatePriority

        void updatePriority(T t,
                  double p)
        Change the priority of t to p. Must take worst-case time no more than O(log N).

      • add

        void add(T t,
       double priority)
         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Add t with priority p to the Heap. Throw an illegalArgumentException if t is already in the heap Implement in worst-case time no more than O(log N).
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • size

        int size()
        Return the size of the Heap. Implement in O(1) time.

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Return true iff the Heap is empty. Implement in O(1) time
